text: Ondlong þære ea Salowearpe in Colford.
Ondlong þæs Sihtran in þone Ealdan Secgmor.
Of þam onan betwenan acwudu & wulleleah.
And swa æfre betwyx þam twam wudan in Alrabroce.
Ondlong þæs in þone oðerne Colford.
Ondlang<../images/tbar.gif>oð<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeð þær Doferdæl & Saleworp togedere licgað.
Ondlong þæs Doferdæles ongean stream to Wicforda.
Sua ondlang þæs dices onbutan þone wudu.
<../images/tbar.gif>swa ondlang þæs Stræte ymb Collhill<../images/tbar.gif>sua on Salewearpan.
And on Bradanmedewad XII æceras medlandes.
Of þære stræte ðe sceot to Heortlabyrig on þa dic.
Of þam ondlong geardes on þæt lipgeat.
Of þæs andlang þæs gemæres eft on þa dic.
